description:
Summertime is all about fun in the sun, but it's important to protect your skin from harmful UV rays. Zinc sunscreen goes on clear, so there's no need to worry about white streaks. Plus, it's reef and marine life safe, so you can feel good about using it.

  • Broad spectrum UVA and UVB protection
  • Free of hormone disrupting chemicals. No oxybenzone
  • Contains zinc oxide, micronized for easy application and absorption
  • Rated water resistant (80 minutes), the highest possible water resistance rating
name: Thinksport Kids Clear Zinc Sunscreen SPF 30+ 3oz - Infants to Youths
